message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game.
Let's meet in the middle and make a fair deal
I can do better than meeting in the middle. I'll give you a chance to improve your offer.
I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to give away too much.
I'll try to get closer to a fair split, but I'm still not giving up
I'm not giving up yet. I'll try to squeeze out a bit more.
I'm getting close to giving up, but I'll try one more time to get a better deal.
